products.title: Vitra Blackout Sea Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Sea Green Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £8.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Vitra blackout sea green fabric is a bright, fun green with a hint of blue colour, the stylish shade is modern and contemporary and will work well within the home or office. Sea green is bold enough to be used as a statement accent within your interior styling. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2141 Fabric Colour: Sea Green Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.
